Description: JOB PURPOSE:To perform necessary tasks to maintain full and uninterrupted operations of core & Non-core banking systems’ to meet the service target levels, ensure healthy and stable services for CIB internal andexternal customers.KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:1. Monitor Core & Non-core banking operations daily procedures, record and report any failures in Core bankingsystems for relevant party to ensure smooth systems’ operations.2. Observe Core & Non-core banking operations systems backups to ensure safety of CIB customer & bank data.3. Follow up on all of the Disaster recovery (DR) activities for Core & Non-core banking operations systems to safeguard Core banking’ systems’ operational continuity.4. Detect and report bottlenecks on Core banking systems to provide the needed technical support and recommend solutions.5. Monitor the handling of user’s tickets in order to resolve customer & system issues in a smooth & satisfactory manner.6. Follow up on handling of all related Core & Non-Core banking systems’ interfaces maintenance in order to provide full system functionality to CIB internal & external customers.7. Maintain records of daily data communication transactions, problems and remedial actions taken, or installation activities for Core banking operations systems to support audit requests and/or future reviews.8. Follow up opening operational error records with relevant application support/vendor tracking systems to ensure uninterrupted operations for bank systems.9. Assist in measuring the Core & Non-core banking services availability and recommend improvements to avail best service to CIB internal & external customers.10. Participate in conducting incident reviews for Core & Non-core banking systems to provide lessons learned & avoid future reoccurrence & enhance existing systems availability & resilience.Qualifications & Experience Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering / Computer Science or its equivalent Officer: 2-4 years of relevant IT experience, Sr. Officer: 4-6 years of relevant IT experience Good hands-on knowledge of IT operational work Good knowledge of Core Banking system operationsSkills Good command of English and Arabic languages Good Presentation skills Good Communication skills  Good Analytical and Problem Solving skills Good Knowledge of different IT technologiesJob Details
